text: The `*zoom` and `*width` properties have me confused.

I need help 

when i going to select my template its look not like my template. <https://prnt.sc/v74lps|https://prnt.sc/v74lps>

but this is the orignal preview. why its not looks same. <https://preview.hs-sites.com/_hcms/preview/template/multi?domain=undefined&hs_preview_key=DrOGBrcbegdhCF6CPLhTQA&portalId=8329460&tc_deviceCategory=undefined&template_file_path=exceed-site/templates/about.html&updated=1603719759124|https://preview.hs-sites.com/_hcms/preview/template/multi?domain=undefined&hs_preview_key=DrOGBrcbegdhCF6CPLhTQA&portalId=8329460&tc_deviceCategory=undefined&template_file_path=exceed-site/templates/about.html&updated=1603719759124>

You can set the path to your template screenshot in the Hubl + html file. You place it in the fileâ€™s template annotation at the top.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/html-hubl-templates#template-annotations>

That doc unfortunately does not actually give an example of this, but you would add something like this to the annotation.
_`screenshotPath: ../images/template-previews/home.png`_
Just replace the path with the one to your screenshot.
Hey Chuck, the `*property:value` that you see is for legacy browsers (such as IE7).
